first_para: Mark Robert Timothy Garnier (born 26 February 1963) is a British Conservative Party politician who is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Wyre Forest, elected at the 2010 general election.

full.extract: Mark Robert Timothy Garnier (born 26 February 1963) is a British Conservative Party politician who is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Wyre Forest, elected at the 2010 general election.
full.title: Mark Garnier
